characters.name: Desir Herrman
characters.description:
__Magic Circle Rank:__ Tier 3 (Analysis Magic)

Desir Herrman is the central protagonist of A Returner’s Magic Should Be Special. After his return to the past upon the failure of clearing the Shadow World, he resolves to strengthen his allies so that the future doesn’t get repeated. In Hebrion Academy, commoners are frowned upon and put into the Beta class whilst the nobles are designated the alpha class, Desir is one of the commoners who hates the class system and wants things to change. As a result he and his friends set out to close the gap by showing the teachers and aristocrats that commoners can have as much potential as the nobles if given the right circumstances.

characters.name: Romantica Eru
characters.description:
__Circle Tier Level:__ 3 (Wind Mage)

When Desir Arman first meets Romantica after returning from the Shadow Labyrinth she exhibits a superiority complex due to her position as a noble which slowly decreases as the story progresses and she gets to know Desir Arman. 

~! Later on in the it is discovered that Romantica is the illegitimate child of a baron and the only reason that she has the title of a noble is that her mother traded her life so that Romantica wouldn't have to live the impoverished "commoner's" life. As the story progresses Desir offers her a chance to join the beta class and because of her distaste of how the nobles treat the commoners and so accepted his offer along with Ajest and Pram !~

characters.name: Pram Schneider
characters.description:
__Circle Tier Level:__ 3 (Swordmage)

Pram is a member of Desir Arman's alpha party made of commoners.

~! Pram’s weapon of choice was a rapier made of Blankšum, left by his noble father (The super light rapier). The sword was originally in a rusted hilt and was sold to a pawn shop for little money. Later on, Desir Arman and Pram go back to take the sword back, and after a disagreement, Desir is forced to fight the merchant's bodyguard and take the sword back to its rightful owner !~

characters.name: Azest Kingscrown
characters.description:
__Circle Level Tier:__ 4 (Swordmage)

Azest Jedgar F. Roguepalace was the firstborn of Gilltian Jedgar F. Roguepalace, the current emperor of the Hebrion Empire and thus the heir to the Hebrion throne. Initially Azest was a cold person and she tends to be uninterested about other people unless they consist of her close friends in the Desir group.
~! Azest was one of the six survivors of the Shadow Labyrinth who defeated Brohmier Napolitan along with Desir Arman. She was the core figure of their attack force and their swordmage. She dealt the final blow to kill the boss of the shadow world. !~

characters.name: Zod Exarion
characters.description:
__Circle Tier Level:__ 7 (Sage)

Sage of Wisdom Zod Exarion is the Master of the Tower of Magic and the one and only Seventh-Circle magician in existence. He was known as the greatest mage in the world, the man who had singled-handily revived interest in magic. He also was one of the 100 people who fought against Bhromier Napolitan and one of the six who survived the battle.

characters.name: Swan Katarina
characters.description: Swan Katarina is one of the four Royal Guard of the Hebrion Empire. She is also the best archer in the empire.
